skillTree.name: Lord of the Deeps
skillTree.description: A true Lord knows the Underway, his Dwarfhold and how to fight under the ground better than anyone.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 when fighting against Skaven
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean siege battles
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean intercept battles
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Obstinacy
skillTree.description: This stubborn Dwarf refuses to yield or tire, and ensures his followers are of the same ilk.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Slayer’s Oath
skillTree.description: "We have taken the Slayer’s Oath and would pit our axes against those beasts. If we come back, have all your ale ready. If, instead, it is our time to take the Path of Grimnir, then may our doom be a mighty one. If we do not return, remember us to our clans and kings."

effects.description: Melee attack: +12

skillTree.name: Dragon Slayer
skillTree.description: Daemon Slayer, a warrior who has managed to survive the encounter with one of the most ferocious creatures to ever live, slaying it and surviving to tell the tale.

effects.description: Bonus vs Large: +20

skillTree.name: Daemon Slayer
skillTree.description: Daemon Slayers seek out the most horrifying foes, those in servitude to the Ruinous Powers.

effects.description: Melee attack: +15 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Daemons

skillTree.name: Rune of Grimnir
skillTree.description: The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.name: Redemption Denied
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? This angst-ridden fighter surely doesn't, but now he must seek out and battle ever more ferocious enemies.

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.name: Deathseeker
skillTree.description: Some Slayers, despite their best efforts to find and fight the most formidable of foes, still fail at their task of dying in battle. By dint of constant fighting, these rare Slayers become ever more scar-riddled and dangerous.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%

skillTree.name: Resolute
skillTree.description: Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +7
Charge bonus: +15

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

effects.description: Melee defence: +6
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

effects.description: Hit points: +7%
Hit points: +15%

skillTree.name: Runic Axes
skillTree.description: Slayers seeks nothing more in life than an honorable and glorious death that shall expunge the shame that has pushed him upon this path, and to be remembered in the saga's of his people for all time.

effects.description: Enables magical attacks
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +25
Enables magical attacks
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +50

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

effects.description: Ability: "Foe-Seeker"

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%
Weapon strength: +20%

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

effects.description: Melee attack: +6
Melee attack: +12

skillTree.name: Agile
skillTree.description: While Dwarfs are generally not the most nimble inhabitants of the Old World, they can move surprisingly fast when not slowed by heavy armour.

effects.description: Physical resistance: 7%
Physical resistance: 15%

skillTree.name: Relentless
skillTree.description: Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.

effects.description: Speed: +7%
Speed: +15%

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Ability: "Deadly Onslaught"
Passive ability: "Deathblow"

skillTree.name: Slayer Cult
skillTree.description: A Experienced Slayer is often joined on his journeys by a swarm of younger brethren from the Slayer cult.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -15% for embedded Dragon Slayer Heroes and Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for Daemon Slayer, embedded Dragon Slayer Heroes and Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -30% for embedded Dragon Slayer Heroes and Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

Casualty replenishment rate: +20% for Daemon Slayer, embedded Dragon Slayer Heroes and Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Slayer of Legends
skillTree.description: Some Slayers, despite their best efforts to find and fight the most formidable of foes, still fail at their task of dying in battle. By dint of constant fighting, these rare Slayers become ever more scar-riddled and dangerous.

effects.description:
Bonus vs. Large: +5 for Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs. Large: +10 for Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +10 for Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Doomseekers
skillTree.description: "Great warriors and doomseekers who have unsuccessfully found death thus far..."

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +5 for Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +15% for Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +10 for Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +30% for Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Committed to Die
skillTree.description: Younger Slayers flock towards such renowned killers as Daemon Slayers, as they can be assured that, as he seeks his ultimate destiny, he will lead them straight towards foes against whom a worthy end might be made.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Rage" for Slayer units,
	upgrades to "Berserk" at (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.
Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

effects.description: Speed: +12% for Slayer units

Passive ability: "Journey's End" for Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

ui_effects.description: Entities cannot die while ability is active

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +10%

skillTree.name: Intimidating Presence
skillTree.description: Such is the might of this being that followers and foes alike will shrink back or cower in his intimidating presence.

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -5
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Ruin's End
skillTree.description: Dark, corrupting, evil forces have no place here!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +10 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 10% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Vampire Hunter
skillTree.description: No servant of the Midnight Aristocracy dares stand against the veteran Slayer.

effects.description:
Bonus vs. Large: +10 when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings
	(Lord's army)

Enables flaming attacks when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Orcsbane
skillTree.description: Urks, like all slimy fungus, must be wiped from the boot whenever trodden upon.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Frenzy" when fighting against Greenskins
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Greenskins
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +25% when fighting against Greenskins
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Vengeance of the Dawi
skillTree.description: Such high-minded ways and pure ideals count for nothing when you’re wormfood.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Elves
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +25% when fighting against Elves
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% when fighting against Elves
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: The Rat Catcher
skillTree.description: "Skaven are a disease, a cancer on this world… You are a plague and we are the cure…"

effects.description:
Melee defence: +10 when fighting against Skaven
	(Lord's army)

Vigour loss reduction: -30% when fighting against Skaven
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 10% when fighting against Skaven
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lizard Menace
skillTree.description: Having a plan isn't always enough; sometimes you need insight, sometimes foresight, but always martial strength.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Lizardmen
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Lizardmen
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs. Large: +10 when fighting against Lizardmen
	(Lord's army)
Ability: "Trophy Hunter"

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

skillTree.name: Miner's Instinct
skillTree.description: This Dwarf spent time in the pits, gaining a Miner's intuition of the dangers and prey to be found in the dark.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +6%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +16%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +30%

skillTree.name: Wall Breaker
skillTree.description: "I have seen better lavatory walls than this - I'll have it down by the morrow, that's a pledge!"

effects.description:
Attrition: +5% when under siege
	(enemy armies in local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +8% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

Attrition: +5% when under siege
	(enemy armies in local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +15% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

Attrition: +5% when under siege
	(enemy armies in local region)

skillTree.name: Pure-Beard
skillTree.description: A Dwarf with a fine beard is as Dawi as they come.

effects.description:
Corruption: -1
	(local province)

Corruption: -2
	(local province)

Corruption: -3
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Mason
skillTree.description: Lords close to the powerful Masons' Guild will get discounts for labour and materials.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -2% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -5% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -9% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Iron-Willed
skillTree.description: Such a Dawi does not care for being wounded - by his will alone he continues to fight.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)
Wound recovery time: -1

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enemy battle reinforcement time: +25%
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +50%
Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +50%

skillTree.name: Reassuring Presence
skillTree.description: The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Inspirational Leader
skillTree.description: "All Dwarfs to me! We have grudges to settle - Grimnir demands it!"

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +2%
	(Lord's army)

Casualty replenishment rate: +4%
	(Lord's army)

Casualty replenishment rate: +6%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Alert
skillTree.description: Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description:
Ambush defence chance: +6%
	(Lord's army)
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%

Ambush defence chance: +16%
	(Lord's army)
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

Ambush defence chance: +30%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -8%
	(Lord's army)
Campaign movement range: +5%
Enemy Hero action success chance: -10%
Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

Recruit rank: +1
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Daemon Slayer
backgroundSkills.description: Daemon Slayers are committed to die gloriously fighting monsters, not to leading others or looking after newcomers.

effects.description: A moderate chance that additional slayers will be added to the Regiments of Renown pool after winning battles
Daemon SlayerLord can only recruit units from the Regiments of Renown pool
Gains unique traits after defeating certain monsters
